SearchEquipmentGroupList.MainSQL: SELECT DISTINCT E.EQUIPMENT_ID FROM TB_EGN_EQUIP_SPEC_MST E INNER JOIN TB_EGN_FCTRY_AREA_MST TEFAM ON E.FACTORY_AREA_ID = TEFAM.FACTORY_AREA_ID WHERE TEFAM.FACILITY_CODE = @FACILITY_CODE AND TEFAM.MES_SYSTEM_TYPE_CODE = @SYSTEM_TYPE_CODE AND E.EQUIPMENT_GROUP_ID NOT IN ('MCS') UNION SELECT DISTINCT E.EQUIPMENT_ID FROM TB_EGN_EQUIP_SPEC_MST E INNER JOIN TB_EGN_FCTRY_AREA_MST TEFAM ON E.FACTORY_AREA_ID = TEFAM.FACTORY_AREA_ID WHERE TEFAM.FACILITY_CODE = @FACILITY_CODE -- option1 AND E.EQUIPMENT_GROUP_ID = 'PKG';
